thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 28 of 574
thread.title: Julie McKernan

author: Julie McKernan
title: Julie McKernan
text: I had a genuinely AWESOME experience in ordering my workout outfit today!!! There were MANY color and style choices and checkout was SO easy!!! I've been a member since Fabletics started and would NEVER shop ANYWHERE else for my workout needs!!! I was a Professional Bodybuilder for 23 years and NEVER have I EVER had SUCH NICE workout clothes!!! I LOVE FABLETICS!!!
